name: A sturdy chain necklace
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution like a god.
It decreases the users wisdom adequately.
It decreases the users intelligence adequately.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (little in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'brawl'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'dirty blow'.
